title: Alternate Universe
desc:
Post 2138
- An alternative game is made, with the same players, hands, effects, etc with the name [Name].5
- Both games are played out
- When both games end, if there are 3+ players who got 1st or 2nd in both games combined (one game has 2 completely different winning players from another), those players will play another game of GIUno to see who gets 1st and 2nd
- If two players got 1st/2nd in both games, the game ends
 - If they both got 1st and 2nd, they are tied at 1.5th, else they get their regular placements
